description:
Let's face it, getting your bike stolen sucks. Using a U-lock to secure it is the first step to a long and happy life with your bike. The Ultra 410 Mini U-lock is hard to cut or pry open, so you'll find your ride just where you left it.

  • 12mm diameter hardened steel shackle
  • Double-bolted lock requires two cuts to remove
  • Shackle depth is 15cm, width is 14cm
  • SH 34 carrier fits bikes 24-35 mm tubes
  • 2 keys included to ensure you have a backup if one goes missing
  • Abus security rating of 8/15
name: Abus Ultra Mini 410 SH34 U-Lock
